app_description: KORTV is the global destinaKORTV is the global destination for live Korean entertainment. Stream live broadcasts from the leading Korean television networks such as KBS World TV Chosun Arirang TV and watch the latest movies and shows on demand! Why KORTV The Korean TV experience at the comfort of your home. Get the latest news from Korea with 24 7 TV news networks. Stream hundreds of Korean blockbusters and K Dramas on demand. Stay up to date with dedicated K Pop channels. Watch at home or on the go. KORTV is available on your TV smartphone and tablet. Simple plan structure. No hidden fees or conditions. For more info please visit https: www.kortv.com Choose your subscription plan: Silver Watch 15 Live Korean TV Broadcast including KBS WORLD24 MBN Arirang TV Yonhap News TV 200 Premium Movies and Shows On Demand Regularly Updated 1 Week Free Trial Available! Regional restrictions may apply. Available content may be added changed in the future. Gold All Channels in Silver Package Access 7 More Live TV Channels including TV Chosun and KBS WORLD 200 Premium Movies and Shows On Demand Regularly Updated 1 Week Free Trial Available! Regional restrictions may apply. Available content may be added changed in the future. Users of this application can subscribe to optional auto renewing subscriptions for premium access to additional live channels and on demand content. Should you choose to subscribe to one of the subscriptions please be aware that they will automatically renew each month and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the subscription cost agreed upon at the time of the original auto renewing subscription purchase. You can turn off auto renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but it must be turned off at least 24 hours before the end of a current period to avoid being charged for that time period. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during an active subscription period. Please see the privacy policy for more information. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when you purchase a non free trial subscription. Auto renewing subscriptions available in this app include: Silver Monthly 9.99 US Dollars and auto renews every 30 days Silver Yearly 99.99 US Dollars and auto renews every year Gold Monthly 14.99 US Dollars and auto renews every 30 days Gold Yearly 149.99 US Dollars and auto renews every year Terms of Use: https: www.kortv.com termshttps: www.kortv.com terms
